hero_subtitle: Data engineer, web developer, and Flutter developer. I build digital products with a focus on quality and aesthetics.
about_description: I'm a student at the International IT University (IITU), studying Information Systems. I specialize in data engineering, web development, and mobile development using Flutter. I'm passionate about creating useful digital products and constantly growing as a professional in the IT field. I strive to combine aesthetics and functionality in every project.
projects_kezen_desc: A social network for organizing local events with ratings, interest-based recommendations, and AI-generated event descriptions.
